properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this Telegram credential

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional details about this Telegram integration

properties.name: accessToken
properties.description: Bot access token obtained from Telegram BotFather

properties.name: baseUrl
properties.description: Base URL used to call the Telegram Bot API

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this Gmail credential

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional details about how this Gmail account is used

properties.name: user
properties.description: Email address used for SMTP authentication

properties.name: password
properties.description: SMTP or app-specific password for the Gmail account

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this OpenAI credential

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional details about this OpenAI integration

properties.name: apiKey
properties.description: Secret API key used to authenticate requests to OpenAI

properties.name: organizationId
properties.hint: Only required if you belong to multiple organisations
properties.description: Specify which OpenAI organization should be used for API requests

properties.name: url
properties.description: Override the default OpenAI API base URL

properties.name: allowedHttpRequestDomains

options.name: domains
options.description: Restrict requests to specific domains only

properties.description: Controls which domains this credential can access in HTTP Request nodes

properties.name: allowedDomains
properties.description: Comma-separated list of domains allowed for HTTP requests

properties.name: name
properties.description: A friendly name to identify this VPAAS credential

properties.name: description
properties.description: Additional details about this VPAAS configuration
properties.placeholder: Used for inbound and outbound calling

properties.name: userId
properties.description: Unique user identifier on the Acefone platform

properties.name: did
properties.description: Phone number (DID) used for inbound and outbound calls

properties.name: trunk
properties.description: Trunk configured and associated with the selected DID

properties.name: traceId
properties.description: Optional trace identifier used for debugging and call tracking
